credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Drawing for an escutcheon
medium: Charcoal, pen and ink, brush and red water color on paper.
description: Scrollwork escutcheon, framing an ovoid and having below a small escutcheon framing an oblong.  On top is a helmet with acanthus mantling.  Outlines in the ovoid, in charcoal, a shield with a helmet, with mantling on top; obliquely shown.  Framed approximately as a square above with one, elsewhere with two lines.
name: Drawing
